name: The Sunken Hero
description:
Go to the sea abyss, where the enemies of the underwater world are waiting for you. The time has come for man to conquer the previously unexplored depths. A journey into the secrets of the depths and a life-and-death battle, will make the blood of the adventurers seethe in the veins.

The Sunken Hero is a bullet hell, in which one bullet and your equipment will not survive, sending you to the forefathers. Be careful and do not let yourself be intimidated by some sea monsters. Show dexterity and ingenuity. A variety of weapons, nice graphics and music for true connoisseurs of the genre.

Features of the game:
- Pixel-art
- Beautiful underwater world
- 30 levels
- Hardcore
- Elements of the Bullet-Hell genre
